ComicInfo.Title: The Feast
ComicInfo.Summary:
A middle-aged mom is invited to a surprise afternoon tea party â€” only she's the surprise! After a morning of shopping for an appropriate outfit with her former best friend, they decide her birthday suit is best for the occasion. The afternoon is filled with fun for everyone, except for maybe hard-working hubby. 24-page full-color comic book.
